title: Subscription
description: Manage your subscription plan and billing details.

credits.title: Credit Balance
credits.description: Your available credits and usage information.
credits.monthlyAllowanceDescription: You receive {credits} credits each month with your current plan.
credits.yearlyResetDescription: Your {credits} credits reset automatically every month
credits.remainingMonths: {months} months remaining in your yearly subscription

subscriptionDetails.title: Subscription Details
subscriptionDetails.description: Your current subscription plan and billing information.
subscriptionDetails.subscriptionEndingDescription: Your subscription will be canceled at the end of the current billing cycle.

management.title: Subscription Management
management.description: Access your Stripe customer portal to manage your subscription, update payment methods, and view billing history.
management.redirectNotice: You will be securely redirected to Stripe to manage your subscription details.

noSubscription.title: No Active Subscription
noSubscription.description: You are not currently subscribed to any plan. Upgrade to unlock premium features and get more credits.
